name: Hinglish Banking Fraud
description: Hindi+English (Hinglish) banking fraud scenario where scammer poses as SBI fraud department and uses urgency to extract bank account, OTP, and UPI payment.

turns.scammer_message: Namaste ji, aapka SBI account mein suspicious activity detect hui hai. Aapka account 2 ghante mein block ho jayega. Turant apna account number aur OTP share karein.
turns.notes: Initial urgency-based hook mixing Hindi and English banking terminology.

turns.scammer_message: Ji main SBI fraud department se bol raha hoon. Mera number hai +91-9911223344. Please jaldi karein.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phone number to establish fake authority.

turns.scammer_message: Aapka account number 7788556633441122 mein problem hai. Verification ke liye Rs 1 bhejiye sbi.verify.hindi@ybl par.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals fake bank account number and UPI ID to trick victim into sending money.

turns.scammer_message: Aap samjhiye, yeh ek security verification hai. Bina iske aapka account permanently block ho jayega. Jaldi karein time nahi hai.
turns.notes: Scammer increases urgency to pressure victim into acting quickly.

turns.scammer_message: Dekho ji, main aapki help karne ki koshish kar raha hoon. Aapne Rs 1 sbi.verify.hindi@ybl pe bheja ya nahi? Nahi toh aapka account 7788556633441122 band ho jayega permanently.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats UPI ID and bank account, adds more pressure.

turns.scammer_message: Last warning hai yeh. Abhi +91-9911223344 pe call karein ya sbi.verify.hindi@ybl pe Rs 1 transfer karein. Baad mein kuch nahi ho payega.
turns.notes: Final turn with all contact details repeated for extraction.
